item.title: BCIN Building Permit Application - New Residential Construction in Sudbury
item.description: Building permit application for a new 3-bedroom residential home in Sudbury, Ontario. BCIN certified project requiring general contractor services.

item.title: Home Renovation Project - Kitchen and Bathroom Remodel in North Bay
item.description: Full kitchen and bathroom renovation project in North Bay. Seeking licensed contractors with BCIN certification for structural modifications.

item.title: Commercial Construction Tender - Retail Space Build-out Sudbury Downtown
item.description: Commercial construction tender for retail space renovation in downtown Sudbury. BCIN permit required for electrical and plumbing work.

item.title: Basement Finishing Job - Sudbury Family Home
item.description: Basement finishing project in Sudbury. Requires building permit and BCIN-qualified contractor for proper code compliance.

item.title: Deck and Fence Construction - North Bay Residential Property
item.description: Deck and fence construction project in North Bay. BCIN certification preferred for permit acquisition assistance.
